full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Tender Information

### Reference Information
- Reference Number: WS3760796939-Doc3771641220
- Amendment Number: 2
- Solicitation Number: WS3760796939

### Tender Details
- Publication Date: 2022-12-01
- Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-19T14:00:00 (Expired)
- Amendment Date: 2022-12-08
- Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-01-11
- Expected Contract End Date: 2023-12-23

### Procurement Information
- Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
- Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
- Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Contract Information
- Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- End User Entities: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Notice Information
- Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
- Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14788389?extsite=MTQ3ODgzODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Trade Agreements
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Contact Information
- Contact Name: Heureuse Saint-Juste (SPAC/PSPC)
- Contact Email: heureuse.saint-juste@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Contact Phone: Not available

# Tender Description
EP067-231441- Conference Chairs RFP is a request for proposals to procure office furniture. The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD) and the procurement method is competitive open bidding. The expected contract start date is 2023-01-11 and the expected contract end date is 2023-12-23. The tender is expired, and the tender closing date was 2022-12-19T14:00:00.  We kindly invite bids from capable and interested suppliers.
